body:
I stand corrected then! I also had my timelines wrong. I thought that your blog post happened well before the last time I saw this failure, but reviewing the timestamps more closely, it looks like we haven't seen this problem since before the AUFS changes were put in place.

I'll keep an eye on this for a little while longer, but if I don't see it again soon, I guess we can close this issue out.

Thanks for the help!

body_html:
I stand corrected then! I also had my timelines wrong. I thought that your blog post happened well before the last time I saw this failure, but reviewing the timestamps more closely, it looks like we haven't seen this problem since before the AUFS changes were put in place.

I'll keep an eye on this for a little while longer, but if I don't see it again soon, I guess we can close this issue out.

Thanks for the help!
